text: Ceylon Manohar () ( – 22 January 2018), popular name of A. E. Manoharan also known as Surangani Manohar (), was a pop singer and actor. He has played roles in Tamil films and other Sri Lankan Tamil works. Manoharan was 73 when he died in Chennai of age-related ailments. He is majorly known for the song "Surangani", which attained cult status in the 1970s and 1980s in Tamil Nadu. ==Filmography== *Maanavan (Tamil Movie) *Mangudi Minor (Tamil Movie) *En Kelvikku Enna Bathil (Tamil Movie) *Naan Potta Savaal (Tamil Movie) *Aavesham (Malayalam Movie) *Thacholi Ambu (Malayalam Movie) *Maamaankam (Malayalam Movie) *Shakthi (Malayalam Movie) *Kazhukan (Malayalam Movie) *Kolilakkam (Malayalam Movie) *Thadavara (Malayalam Movie) *Aarani Mantalu (Telugu Movie) *Chattaniki Kallu Levu (Telugu Movie) *Lorry Driver Rajakannu (Tamil Movie) *Manitharil Ithanai Nirangala (Tamil Movie) *Neethibathi (Tamil Movie) *Jay Jay (Tamil Movie) *Thotti Jaya (Tamil Movie) * Pasa Nila (Sri Lanka Tamil movie) ==Serials== *Athipookal *Muhurthaam ==References== ==External links== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:2018 deaths Category:Malayalam playback singers Category:Tamil male actors Category:Tamil playback singers Category:Indian male film singers Category:Indian male pop singers Category:Male actors in Tamil cinema Category:Telugu playback singers Category:20th-century Indian singers Category:21st-century Indian singers Category:Singers from Chennai Category:20th-century male singers Category:21st-century male singers
